org.locationtech.geowave.core.store.query.filter.expression

Interface Filter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Persistable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BooleanExpression, Predicate
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    After, And, BBox, Before, BeforeOrDuring, Between, BinaryPredicate, BinarySpatialPredicate, BinaryTemporalPredicate, BooleanFieldValue, BooleanLiteral, ComparisonOperator, Contains, Crosses, Disjoint, During, DuringOrAfter, EndsWith, Exclude, GenericEqualTo, GenericNotEqualTo, Include, Intersects, IsNotNull, IsNull, MultiFilterOperator, Not, NumericBetween, NumericComparisonOperator, Or, Overlaps, SpatialContains, SpatialEqualTo, SpatialNotEqualTo, StartsWith, TemporalBetween, TemporalEqualTo, TemporalNotEqualTo, TextBetween, TextBinaryPredicate, TextComparisonOperator, TimeOverlaps, Touches, Within

    public interface Filter
extends Persistable
    Base interface for GeoWave filter objects. These filters can be used to generate constraints and test entries of a data type adapter to see if they match a set of conditions.

    • Method Detail

      • evaluate

        boolean evaluate(Map<String,Object> fieldValues)
        Evaluate this filter using a map of field values.
        Parameters:
        fieldValues - the field values to evaluate the expression with, the key represents the field name, and the value represents the field value
        Returns:
        true if the filter passes

      • evaluate

        <T> boolean evaluate(DataTypeAdapter<T> adapter,
                     T entry)
        Evaluate this filter using the given adapter and entry.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the class of the adapter entries
        Parameters:
        adapter - the data type adapter
        entry - the entry to test
        Returns:
        true if the filter passes

      • prepare

        void prepare(DataTypeAdapter<?> adapter,
             AdapterToIndexMapping indexMapping,
             Index index)
        Prepare this filter for efficient testing using the provided adapter and index.
        Parameters:
        adapter - the data type adapter
        indexMapping - the adapter to index mapping
        index - the index

      • addReferencedFields

        void addReferencedFields(Set<String> fields)
        Adds all adapter fields referenced by this filter to the provided set.
        Parameters:
        fields - the set to populate with the referenced fields

      • getConstrainableFields

        Set<String> getConstrainableFields()
        Returns:
        a set of all fields that can potentially be constrained by the filter

      • removePredicatesForFields

        Filter removePredicatesForFields(Set<String> fields)
        Remove any exact and constrained predicates that reference fields in the provided set.
        Parameters:
        fields - the fields to remove
        Returns:
        an updated filter with the predicates removed

      • getConstraints

        default <V extends Comparable<V>> FilterConstraints<V> getConstraints(Class<V> constraintClass,
                                                                      DataStatisticsStore statsStore,
                                                                      DataTypeAdapter<?> adapter,
                                                                      AdapterToIndexMapping indexMapping,
                                                                      Index index,
                                                                      Set<String> indexedFields)
        Generate constraints for the given index based on this filter.
        Parameters:
        constraintClass - the class that the index expects for constraints
        statsStore - the data statistics store
        adapter - the data type adapter
        indexMapping - the adapter to index mapping
        index - the index
        indexedFields - a set of all adapter fields used by the index mapping
        Returns:
        the constraints for the index that this filter represents

        Returns:
